slider.directions:
Where can you find credible news online? There are many things you can do. Give a few of these a try. Select anywhere on the device's screen to view the different ideas.

Select "Go!" to begin.

item.title: Where can you find credible news online?
item.content: 1. Search for names of respected journalists. Many reporters and news personalities run blogs, and you can subscribe to get regular updates from them.

item.title: Where can you find credible news online?
item.content: 1. Read comments under any news stories you read, listen to, or watch online. Other people on the Internet may share interesting links or information that can lead you to more good sources. Be sure to verify these sources by double-checking them.

item.title: Where can you find credible news online?
item.content: 1. Ask other journalists or people who get their news online for a list of favorite sites. Review these to see what you think.
